attributes.action: Government Should Lobby Ask.Fm With There Powers, To Make Changes To There Website And Increase Security For The People On It
attributes.additional_details: The Government, Should Lobby Ask Fm  To Increase There Security For The People On It. The Government Could Propose This Idea. "Ask.Fm Should Make Account Making Compulsary With Them Agreeing To Ask.Fm To Store There IP Address But Still Keep Anonymity By Letting The Person Post Something Anonymous, The Reciever Can Then Report The Post To Ask.Fm, Ask.Fm Then Can Either Forward To The Claim To The Police Or Ban The Account" This Way The Government Will Be Showing The Public They Do Not Stand For Cyberbullyng
